name: Dave Chappelle: Sticks & Stones
description: Dave Chappelle: Sticks & Stones is a TV special starring Dave Chappelle. Dave Chappelle takes on gun culture, the opioid crisis, and the tidal wave of celebrity scandals in a defiant stand-up special filmed in Atlanta.
keywords: tv special,stand up comedy,comedy special,reference to michael jackson,reference to r. kelly

review.name: Notice how audience reviews vastly differ from liberal news outlet reviews?! If that doesn't open your eyes...
review.reviewBody:
Those glorified bloggers are triggered into oblivion! Trying to one-up each other thinking of how to undermine Chappelle for his honesty. In just a few days I saw like 10 different pathetic approaches, all "recommended" by Google News of course.

As for the special itself... It's hilarious, refreshing.. AND I learned about shotgun shells!

Dave's energy and giant balls make this a unique comedy special in 2019. Unless you're some miserable, petty, sad, self-victimizing, generally joyless and pathetic glorified blogger, looking to nit-pick and criticize as if you're perfect yourself (god forbid you look at yourself) - you should be able to enjoy this special and appreciate his bravery. I'm "a poor white with guns" and you don't see me getting triggered because my group were made fun of. He made fun of everything - as he should be able to.

The last time I was so amazed and laughing so hard at an open comedian like this Patrice O'Neal was alive...

Title: Dave Chappelle: Sticks & Stones
